I have created better support for filters (primarily
CategoriesIncludeFilter and CategoriesExcludeFilter but any Filter can
be plugged in, including an IgnoreFilter that uses the filter
mechanism to support @Ignore). I would like to contribute this code to
the JUnit project but it uses mocks for some of the testing. What
mocking framework does the JUnit project use in its testing? If it
currently doesn't use a mocking framework, should I rewrite the tests
to be more end-to-end?

Thanks,
Noel
